snippet: Mr. Davis’s eight books included tomes on the Kennedys, the Guggenheims, the Gambinos and the Bouviers, to whom he was related.
abstract: John H Davis, prolific chronicler of prominent American families and a cousin of Jacqueline Onassis, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Davis’s eight books included tomes on the Kennedys, the Guggenheims, the Gambinos and the Bouviers, to whom he was related.

headline.seo: John H. Davis, Chronicler of Kennedys and Others, Dies at 82
headline.main: John H. Davis, Writer With Tie to Kennedys, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: John H. Davis, Writer With Tie to Kennedys, Dies at 82
